name: Bloodroot Poison
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice

name: Bludger
effect: Before each of your turns, Bludger does 3 damage to your opponent if a match is in play. (If no match, Bludger does no damage).

name: Bravado
effect: For the rest of this turn, your Spell cards need 5 less Power to play. (You will still need at least 1 Power that matches.)

name: Bruisewort Balm
effect: Shuffle up to 5 non-healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Care of Magical Creatures
effect: Provides: 1F

name: Catch the Snitch
effect: You win the current Match. (You get the Prize.)

name: Charms
effect: Provides: 1C

name: Charms Exam
effect: Your opponent discards his/her hand. Then he/she may draw any number of cards.

name: Chocolate Frogs
effect: Search your deck. You may take a Wizard or a Witch card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Cleansweep Seven
effect:
Provides: 1Q
When you play this card, look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put them back on top in any order. (If there are fewer than 4, look at all of them.) If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

name: Cobbing
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in play,he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

name: Cobra Lily
effect: At the end of each of your turns, remove all damage counters from Cobra Lily.

name: Comet Two Sixty
effect:
Provides: 1Q
Once during each of your opponent's turns, you may prevent 1 damage done to you. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

name: Defence!
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you.

name: Desk Into Pig
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Search your deck. You may take up to 3 Creature cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Devil's Snare
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your F Lessons from play. At the end of each of your turns, remove all damage counters from Devil's Snare.

name: Diffindo
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character). Your opponent discards that card.

name: Doxy
effect: When you play this card, you may choose another Creature in play. Do 2 damage to it.

name: Drowsiness Draught
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Lesson cards.

name: Fluffy
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your F lessons from play.

name: Fouled!
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she gets 1 fewer Action. (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action).

name: Fred & George Weasley
effect: You may use 1 Action (instead of 2) to put an Adventure card from your hand into play, even if you already have one in play. If you already had one in play, discard the old one. (Nobody gets the reward.)

name: Gaze Into the Mirror
effect:
Effect: During your opponent's turns, prevent all Spells damage done to you by Spell cards.
To Solve: Your opponent chooses 5 Spell cards in his or her hand and discards them.
Opponent's Reward: Opponent gets 1 more Action (the turn this adventure is solved).

name: Gold Cauldron
effect:
Provides: 5P
To play this card, return 2 of your P lessons from play to your hand.

name: Golden Snitch
effect: At the end of your opponent's turn, you win the game unless your opponent has at least 10 more cards in his or her deck than you do. (If he or she does, your opponent wins the game instead.)

name: Gone!
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Creature cards there, choose one and discard it.

name: Hagrid Needs Help
effect:
Effect: Your opponent gets one fewer Action on each of his or her turns (even the turn this Adventure is solved).(If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets one Action.)
Solve: You opponent takes 8 damage.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw 3 cards.

name: Halloween Feast
effect: Put up to 4 Creature cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Harry the Seeker
effect: Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play a Q lesson, you may draw a card.

name: Hospital Bed
effect: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Healing card, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Hufflepuff Match
effect:
To Win: Do 8 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
Prize: The winner may draw 5 cards, the loose takes 5 damage.

name: In the Stands
effect:
Effect: Your opponent can't play creature cards.
To solve: Your opponent chooses 4 Creature cards in his or her hand and discard them.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw a card

name: Into the Forbidden Forest
effect:
Effect: Whenever 1 of your Creatures does damage to your opponent, it does 1 more damage.
To Solve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other)
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Jawbind Potion
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't play Spell cards.

name: Madam Rolanda Hooch
effect:
Provides: 1Q
Once per game, you may search your deck. When you do, you may take a Broom card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Marcus Flint
effect: Once per game, you may make your opponent choose 3 cards in his or her hand and discard them. (If there are fewer than 3 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)

name: Mice to Snuffboxes
effect: Choose up to 2 Creatures in play and return them to their owners' hands.

name: Missing Parchment
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Spell cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Mopsus Potion
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

name: Neville Longbottom
effect: Your may prevent all but the first 8 damage done to you each turn.

name: Nimbus Two Thousand
effect:
Provides: 1Q
Whenever 1 of your Item or Spell cards that needs Q power does damage, it does 2 more damage. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

name: No Time to Play
effect: Discard all Matches and items that need Q Power from play (even your own). (If a match is discarded, no-one gets the prize).

name: Oliver Wood
effect: Once per game, when 1 of your Spell cards that needs Q Power does damage, you may have it do 8 more damage.

name: Ouch!
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

name: Out of Control
effect: Do 6 damage to your opponent. Then your opponent chooses 4 cards in his or her hand and discards them. (If there are fewer than 4 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)

name: Penalty Shot
effect: Draw 3 cards.

name: Pep Talk
effect:
Effect: The first Action your opponent uses on each of his or her turns must be used to draw a card.
To Solve: Your opponent shows you a card from his or her hand with a (printed) Power needed of 8 or more.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw 2 cards.

name: Petrificus Totalus
effect: Choose 1 of either player's Creatures in play and a Lesson card in that player's discard pile. Discard that Creature and put that Lesson card into play.

name: Potions
effect: Provides: 1P

name: Potions Class Disaster
effect: Your opponent chooses 5 of his or her cards and discards them. Those cards can come from his or her hand or from play or from both. (If there are fewer than 5 total cards in your opponent's hand and in play, he or she discards them all.)

name: Power Play
effect: Play this card only if a Match is in play. Do 7 damage to your opponent.

name: Practice Match
effect:
To Win: Do 5 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
Prize: The winner may draw 4 cards.

name: Prof. Minerva McGonagall
effect:
Provides: 1T
Once per game, you may discard the Adventure your opponent has played. (You don't get the reward.)

name: Pulling Up
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent. Then draw 2 cards.

name: Put-Outer
effect: You may use 2 Actions to choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and return it to his or her hand.

name: Quidditch
effect: Provides: 1Q

name: Race for the Snitch
effect:
Effect: Your opponent discards the card he or she draws at the start of each of his or her turns.
To solve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
Opponent's Reward: You discard your hand.

name: Ravenclaw Match
effect:
To Win: Do 10 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
Prize: The winner searches his or her deck. He or she may take up to 2 Lesson cards from his or her deck and put them into play. Then that player shuffles his or her deck.

name: Research
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Search your deck. You may put up to 2 Lesson cards from your deck into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Rope Bind
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a creature of your choice. Then draw a card.

name: Scabbers
effect: If Scabbers is discarded from play during your opponent's turn, put it into your hand.

name: Seamus Finnigan
effect: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 2 cards from your hand to get 1 more Action.

name: Searching for the Snitch
effect: Search you deck. You may take a quidditch lesson or a card that needs quidditch power from you deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Slytherin Match
effect:
To Win: Do 15 damage to your opponent while this card is in play (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
Prize: The winner may shuffle up to 15 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

name: Smash!
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in plan and discard it.

name: Snape's Bias
effect:
Effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to draw cards.
To Solve: Your opponent lets you search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

name: Start-of-Term Feast
effect: Put up to 4 lesson cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Sticking Up for Neville
effect:
Effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 4 damage.
To solve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may put up to 4 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile on the bottom of his or her deck (in any order).

name: Strategy Session
effect: You may put up to 3 Quidditch Lesson from your hand into play.

name: Stream of Flames
effect: Do 3 Damage to your opponent. You may also choose a Creature in play and do 3 damage to it.

name: Streeler
effect: When you play this card, you may choose another Creature in play. Do 1 Damage to it.

name: Support Banner
effect: At the end of your turn, draw a card if you played at least 1 Spell card that needs Q Power that turn.

name: Swarm!
effect: Count the number or Creatures in play (yours and your opponent's) Do that much damage to your opponent.

name: The Sorting Hat
effect: You may use 2 Actions to search your deck. You may take a Character card of a Character that isn't already in play and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Time Out
effect: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and put them back on top in any order. (If there are fewer than 6, look at all of them.)

name: Transfiguration
effect: Provides: 1T

name: Trevor
effect: When you play this card, you may put a Lesson card from your discard pile into your hand. Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Trevor take that damage instead.

name: Vanish
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures or Characters in play (other than his or her starting Character) and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.

name: Weakness Potion
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 5 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.
